verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chereko chereko
chereko chereko (chereko),
chereko chereko
Bwana amefufuka. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kwa maringo tunaimbaimba,
kwa maringo tunachezacheza,
twafurahi Bwana
Yesu amefufuka.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hoihoi na nderemo nyingi,
na vinanda pia tuvipige,
twafurahi ukombozi
wetu umetimia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yeye ndiye mshinda mauti,
yeye ndiye shujaa wa kifo,
Yeye ndiye mshinda
shetani amefufuka.
